nodes.bodyText:
What's the reasoning behind calling this generic? Wouldn't it be better to call this gim or graylog-schema or something similar?
And should we include a version number? Or how would we handle different versions of the schema?

We had mentioned on the side that we would call the type "generic" in our last meeting about it, at least that is what I had written down. I cannot recall the reasoning though. So, I would rename it to gim - and include the versioning, so it would be gim-v1 for now.
